content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":80541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　任せるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm counting on you.\""},{"lineNumber":80542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ええ、分かりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, understood.\""},{"lineNumber":80543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どけどけどけどけーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Move, move, move, move---!\""},{"lineNumber":80544,"originalJapaneseLine":"近くの雑魚を切り捨てながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Cutting down the nearby small fry,"},{"lineNumber":80545,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがサテラの指さした方へ走る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance ran towards the direction Satella pointed."},{"lineNumber":80546,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時――","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment—"},{"lineNumber":80547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Die!\""},{"lineNumber":80548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおっ！　危なっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! That was close!\""},{"lineNumber":80549,"originalJapaneseLine":"走り抜けるランスの首めがけて","translatedEnglishLine":"A blade swung towards Rance's neck as he ran through,"},{"lineNumber":80550,"originalJapaneseLine":"振られた刃を、ランスがギリギリで避ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rance barely dodged the swinging blade."},{"lineNumber":80551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who are you?!\""},{"lineNumber":80552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":80553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なるほど、こりゃあただ者じゃないぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you're no ordinary person!\""},{"lineNumber":80554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、お前ら！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha- you guys!\""},{"lineNumber":80555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、久しぶりですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it's been a while."},{"lineNumber":80556,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオスマスター……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos Master...\""},{"lineNumber":80557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな戦場で会うたぁ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To meet on a battlefield like this,"},{"lineNumber":80558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やーっぱ縁があるのかもな、俺達！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess we really are connected somehow!\""},{"lineNumber":80559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どけ！　今はお前らなんぞどうでもいいわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Get out of the way! I couldn’t care less about you guys right now!\""},{"lineNumber":80560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっと、そうはいかねぇ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, no you don’t!\""},{"lineNumber":80561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつぞやの決着、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The score we couldn’t settle before,"},{"lineNumber":80562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今ここで――」","translatedEnglishLine":"right here, right now—\""},{"lineNumber":80563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh...!\""},{"lineNumber":80564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな死にたきゃ殺してやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you want to die that badly, I’ll kill you!\""},{"lineNumber":80565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーんうーん……うーんうーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, hmm... Hmm, hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":80566,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いが激化していく中、","translatedEnglishLine":"As the battle intensified,"},{"lineNumber":80567,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍側の魔物大将軍ピサロは","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon army’s great general Pisaro"},{"lineNumber":80568,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いを放棄して考え事に耽っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"gave up fighting and was lost in thought."},{"lineNumber":80569,"originalJapaneseLine":"（先ほどのケイブリス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"(That Cavebliss-sama earlier...)"},{"lineNumber":80570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とんでもなく恐ろしかった……）","translatedEnglishLine":"was unbelievably terrifying...)"},{"lineNumber":80571,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あの調子では本当に俺まで","translatedEnglishLine":"(At that rate, I might truly get killed too...)"},{"lineNumber":80572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殺されかねない……）","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":80573,"originalJapaneseLine":"（なんとかゴマをすって","translatedEnglishLine":"(I have to somehow flatter her and"},{"lineNumber":80574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　機嫌を良くしてもらわなければ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"get her into a good mood...)"},{"lineNumber":80575,"originalJapaneseLine":"（しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"(But..."},{"lineNumber":80576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　金銀を贈っても喜ばなさそうだぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"she doesn’t seem pleased if I give gold or silver...)"},{"lineNumber":80577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大体、それらは俺の宝物だ、あげたくない）","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, those are my treasures—I don’t want to give them away.)"},{"lineNumber":80578,"originalJapaneseLine":"（う、う〜む……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ugh, hmmm..."},{"lineNumber":80579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か、何かないだろうか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Is there something, anything...? )"},{"lineNumber":80580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここかァーーーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this is the place---!\""},{"lineNumber":80581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なななな、なんだぁ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha-wh-wh-what!?!\""},{"lineNumber":80582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ？　兵が沢山いるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, yeah? Since there are so many soldiers,"},{"lineNumber":80583,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この辺にケイブリスがいるのかと思ったが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought Cavebliss might be around here...\""},{"lineNumber":80584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、違ったようだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, it seems I was wrong."},{"lineNumber":80585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こいつは魔物大将軍ピサロ。","translatedEnglishLine":"This guy is the demon great general Pisaro."},{"lineNumber":80586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確かに偉い奴だが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s definitely important, but...\""},{"lineNumber":80587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、ケイブリス以外に用はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, I have no business with anyone but Cavebliss."},{"lineNumber":80588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s go.\""},{"lineNumber":80589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーしよ、そーしよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that’s what I’ll do, that’s what I’ll do.\""},{"lineNumber":80590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どけどけどけどけーーーッ！」
近くの雑魚を切り捨てながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cutting down the nearby small fry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがサテラの指さした方へ走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance ran towards the direction Satella pointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 走り抜けるランスの首めがけて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A blade swung towards Rance's neck as he ran through,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振られた刃を、ランスがギリギリで避ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rance barely dodged the swinging blade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、こりゃあただ者じゃないぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you're no ordinary person!"
"To meet on a battlefield like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やーっぱ縁があるのかもな、俺達！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess we really are connected somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どけ！　今はお前らなんぞどうでもいいわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Get out of the way! I couldn’t care less about you guys right now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな死にたきゃ殺してやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you want to die that badly, I’ll kill you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーんうーん……うーんうーん……」
戦いが激化していく中、
魔軍側の魔物大将軍ピサロは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army’s great general Pisaro

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いを放棄して考え事に耽っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gave up fighting and was lost in thought.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもなく恐ろしかった……）
（あの調子では本当に俺まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (At that rate, I might truly get killed too...)
(I have to somehow flatter her and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機嫌を良くしてもらわなければ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: get her into a good mood...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金銀を贈っても喜ばなさそうだぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she doesn’t seem pleased if I give gold or silver...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大体、それらは俺の宝物だ、あげたくない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, those are my treasures—I don’t want to give them away.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か、何かないだろうか……）
「あ、ああ？　兵が沢山いるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, yeah? Since there are so many soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺にケイブリスがいるのかと思ったが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought Cavebliss might be around here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつは魔物大将軍ピサロ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy is the demon great general Pisaro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、ケイブリス以外に用はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, I have no business with anyone but Cavebliss.
"Yeah, that’s what I’ll do, that’s what I’ll do."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
